alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 700 PM MST... At 615 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lost Dutchman State Park, or near Apache Junction, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Superstition Springs Mall, Seville, Superstition Mountains, Kings Ranch, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, and Chandler Heights. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 188 and 205. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 24 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek
